languages.text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} это существо получает эффект "кровавый барьер", число уровней которого равно числу врагов, на которых действует {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}. Также это существо восстанавливает +10% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за каждый уровень эффекта "кровавый барьер".
languages.original_text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

languages.text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.
languages.original_text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} это существо получает эффект "кровавый барьер", число уровней которого равно числу врагов, на которых действует {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}. Также это существо восстанавливает +10% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за каждый уровень эффекта "кровавый барьер".

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum wounds per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

languages.text: 此生物{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，获得“鲜血屏障”效果，层数等同于处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态敌人的数量。此生物每有1层“鲜血屏障”效果，就会恢复10%的最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

traits.locale_text: 此生物{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，获得“鲜血屏障”效果，层数等同于处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态敌人的数量。此生物每有1层“鲜血屏障”效果，就会恢复10%的最大生命值。

languages.text: その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}している敵の数に等しいスタック数の血のバリアを得る。また、この生物は出血に苦しんでいる生物の数1匹につき最大の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の+10%をとり戻す。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

traits.locale_text: その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}している敵の数に等しいスタック数の血のバリアを得る。また、この生物は出血に苦しんでいる生物の数1体につき最大の傷の＋10％をとり戻す。

languages.text: Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura gana tantas acumulaciones de barrera de sangre como enemigos sufren de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. La criatura también recupera un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas por cada acumulación de barrera de sangre que gana.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

traits.locale_text: Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura gana tantas acumulaciones de barrera de sangre como enemigos sufren de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. La criatura también recupera un 10 % de sus heridas máximas por cada acumulación de barrera de sangre que gana.

languages.text: Zu Beginn ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält diese Kreatur einen Stapel "Blutbarriere" entsprechend der Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutenden{/g} Feinde. Diese Kreatur erhält außerdem +10 % ihrer maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} pro erhaltenem Blutbarriere-Stapel zurück.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält diese Kreatur einen Stapel Blutbarriere entsprechend der Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutenden{/g} Feinde. Diese Kreatur erhält außerdem +10 % ihrer maximalen Wunden pro erhaltenem Stapel Blutbarriere zurück.

languages.text: Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature acquiert un nombre de cumuls de Barrière de sang égal au nombre d'ennemis frappés par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Elle récupère également +10 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum par nombre de cumuls de Barrière de sang obtenus.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.

traits.locale_text: Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature acquiert un nombre de cumuls de Barrière de Sang égal au nombre d'ennemis frappés par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Elle récupère également +10 % de sa réserve de blessures maximum par nombre de cumuls de Barrière de Sang acquis.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kan kaybeden{/g} düşman sayısı kadar kan bariyeri birikimi kazanır. Ayrıca yaratığın kazandığı her kan bariyeri birikiminde maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının +%10'u tazelenir.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature gains stacks of blood barrier equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies. This creature also regains +10% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per number of blood barrier stacks gained.
